channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report E-2024090368
item.description:
Report E-2024090368

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-19T09:21:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-19
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8250
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was pumping out the customer's storage tank and overfilled the tank trailer. This resulted in approximately 250 gallons of gasoline being released. Miller Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
